articles.title: Reaction: Premier League title-race goes to final week as Arsenal win at Man Utd
articles.description: Reaction as Arsenal beat Manchester United to take the Premier League title-race to the final week, plus latest football news and build-up to the week's decisive matches.
articles.content:
Man Utd 0-1 Arsenal
Arsenal returned to the top of the Premier League and ensured the title race will go to the final day with victory over Manchester United at Old Trafford.
